html:
Open ye your gates. The righteous will sing out to God, asking for entrance to the holy city: "Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, [and] I will praise the Lord: This gate of the Lord, into which the righteous shall enter" (13:2; Ps. 118:19-20).

righteous nation which keepeth the truth. These are the Lord's covenant people. The truths they keep are the laws and covenants of God, and their obedience will give them the right to enter the gates (33:14-16; 35:8-10).
